Section.Catchline: Priority of security interests in transferred collateral.

Subsection.Text: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2), a security interest created by a debtor is subordinate to a security interest in the same collateral created by another person if:

Paragraph.Text: The debtor acquired the collateral subject to the security interest created by the other person;
The security interest created by the other person was perfected when the debtor acquired the collateral; and
There is no period thereafter during which the security interest is unperfected.

Subsection.Text: Subsection (1) subordinates a security interest only if the security interest:

Paragraph.Text: Otherwise would have priority solely under s. 679.322(1) or s. 679.324; or
Arose solely under s. 672.711(3) or s. 680.508(5).
